title: Qualitative Research and Grounded Theory books by Strauss &
description:
Two books by Juliet Corbin and Anselm Strauss on Qualitative Research and Grounded Theory, plus a bonus article which was published as chapter 17 in Denzin & Lincoln's "Handbook of Qualitative Research" (1rst ed. 1994).

I know these textbooks can be quite expensive if you are a student, so I make them accessible for you on TPB.

Please share and seed, but also don't forget to support authors by buying a copy as soon as you can afford to, if you find them useful!


Basics of Qualitative Research, 3rd ed. (2007)

Grounded Theory in Practice (1997)

Chapter 17 from The SAGE Handbook of Qualitative Research (1994)
